statements: SELECT * FROM room_availability;
SELECT room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM room_availability WHERE room_id = 101;
SELECT room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM room_availability WHERE occupancy_status = 'AVAILABLE';
SELECT room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM room_availability ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM room_availability WHERE check_in_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM room_availability WHERE room_id = 101 AND check_in_date >= '2022-08-01'
SELECT room_id, occupancy_status FROM room_availability WHERE check_out_date < '2022-09-01' ORDER BY room_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT room_id FROM room_availability WHERE check_out_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30'
SELECT * FROM room_availability WHERE room_id IN (101, 102, 103) AND occupancy_status = 'occupied' ORDER BY room_id, check_in_date
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(check_out_date, check_in_date)) AS avg_stay_duration FROM room_availability WHERE occupancy_status = 'occupied'
SELECT * FROM RoomAvailability;
SELECT room_id, check_in_date, occupancy_level FROM RoomAvailability ORDER BY room_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM OccupancyHistory WHERE room_id = 101;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM OccupancyHistory WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT room_id, COUNT(occupancy_id) AS total_occupancy FROM OccupancyHistory GROUP BY room_id HAVING total_occupancy > 5;
SELECT * FROM RoomAvailability WHERE room_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM OccupancyHistory WHERE guest_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT room_id, check_in_date FROM RoomAvailability WHERE occupancy_level > 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_occupancy FROM OccupancyHistory WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-01-01' AND check_out_date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT AVG(occupancy_level) AS average_occupancy FROM RoomAvailability;
SELECT * FROM room_availability;
SELECT room_id, check_in_date FROM room_availability WHERE room_id = 1;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservation WHERE guest_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM room_availability ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, room_id, timestamp FROM occupancy_logs;
SELECT * FROM room_availability WHERE occupancy_level > 2 ORDER BY check_in_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT reservation.guest_name, room_availability.check_in_date, reservation.check_out_date FROM reservation INNER JOIN room_availability ON reservation.room_id = room_availability.room_id WHERE reservation.check_in_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT room_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM reservation GROUP BY room_id HAVING total_reservations > 3 ORDER BY total_reservations DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT guest_name FROM reservation WHERE guest_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY guest_name ASC;
SELECT room_id, SUM(occupancy_level) AS total_occupancy FROM occupancy_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY room_id ORDER BY total_occupancy DESC;
SELECT * FROM room_availability;
SELECT room_id, check_in_date, occupancy_level FROM room_availability ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT room_id, check_out_date FROM room_availability WHERE occupancy_level > 1;
SELECT room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM room_availability WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date, occupancy_level FROM room_availability JOIN room_status ON room_availability.room_id = room_status.room_id WHERE room_status.is_occupied = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM room_availability WHERE check_in_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT room_id, check_out_date, occupancy_level FROM room_availability WHERE occupancy_level > 3 ORDER BY occupancy_level DESC;
SELECT room_id, is_occupied FROM room_status WHERE is_occupied = TRUE AND room_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM check_in_log WHERE check_in_date = '2022-01-15' AND room_id = 5 ORDER BY check_in_time DESC;
SELECT room_id, check_out_date, check_out_time FROM check_out_log WHERE room_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM room_availability WHERE room_id = 1;
SELECT room_number, room_type FROM room WHERE capacity > 2;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM guest WHERE guest_id = 3;
SELECT check_in_date, check_out_date FROM check_in ORDER BY check_out_date DESC;
SELECT room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM check_in WHERE guest_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM room_availability WHERE occupancy_status = 'occupied';
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM guest WHERE guest_id = 1;
SELECT room_number, room_type, capacity FROM room ORDER BY room_type DESC, capacity ASC;

SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM guest JOIN check_in ON guest.guest_id = check_in.guest_id JOIN room ON check_in.room_id = room.room_id WHERE check_in_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_out_date FROM guest JOIN check_out ON guest.guest_id = check_out.guest_id JOIN room ON check_out.room_id = room.room_id ORDER BY check_out_date ASC;
